name: United Natural Foods, Inc.
description: United Natural Foods, Inc. (UNFI) is a leading distributor of organic, natural, and specialty foods in the United States and Canada. Founded in 1976 and headquartered in Providence, Rhode Island, UNFI serves thousands of customers, including conventional supermarkets, natural food retailers, and food service operators. The company has built a strong reputation for providing a comprehensive portfolio of products, including fresh produce, grocery items, and health and beauty products. UNFI is committed to sustainability, emphasizing environmentally responsible sourcing and distribution practices. With a focus on innovation and customer service, UNFI continuously works to expand its product offerings and improve supply chain efficiencies. The company has made significant investments in technology and infrastructure to enhance its distribution networks, enabling it to meet the growing demand for healthy and sustainable food options. UNFI's mission is to connect customers with the best natural and organic products while supporting local farmers and suppliers. Through strategic acquisitions and partnerships, the company aims to further strengthen its position as a leader in the natural and organic food industry.

seo.meta_title: United Natural Foods, Inc. | Leading Organic and Natural Food Distributor
seo.meta_description: Explore United Natural Foods, Inc., a top distributor of organic and natural foods, committed to sustainability and quality products. Learn about UNFI's offerings and values.

faq.question: What does UNFI specialize in?
faq.answer: UNFI specializes in the distribution of organic, natural, and specialty foods.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of UNFI?
faq.answer: Shawn H. W. Burch is the CEO of United Natural Foods, Inc.

faq.question: Where is UNFI headquartered?
faq.answer: UNFI is headquartered in Providence, Rhode Island, USA.

faq.question: What product categories does UNFI offer?
faq.answer: UNFI offers grocery items, fresh produce, and health and beauty products.
